website_summaries.verdict: The Vibram Furoshiki was highly praised for the comfort it brought to users. They raved about its unique construction as it delivered the barefoot-like walking experience they were hoping for.On the downside, the shoe lacked breathability and required some getting used to. But for the most part, the Furoshiki’s versatility, portability, and unique design made it a minimalist shoe of choice for a significant number of customers.
pros: A vast majority of buyers marveled at how comfortable the Vibram Furoshiki was
Numerous purchasers enjoyed the lightweight and flexible nature of the shoe which delivered a barefoot-like experience
Plenty of reviewers commented on how easy and quickly the footgear was to put on and adjust
Many people lauded the shoe’s versatility as it was deemed suitable for leisure activities, casual wear, long flights, and even light exercises
The model could be easily rolled up and carried around in a small pouch that came with it, which was appreciated by multiple purchasers
A good number of users thought that the trainer was well constructed and made of quality materials
Some individuals were delighted that the merchandise can be machine washed
A few people admitted that they preferred the Furoshiki design to the toed Vibram FiveFingers models
cons: The trainer got hot and developed an unpleasant odor when used in a warm environment, according to multiple buyers
Some purchasers considered the footwear a bit pricey for what it had to offer
Several users warned that this type of shoe requires an adjustment period and may not be suitable for everyone

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these bad boys. Sure got a lot of strange looks and comments but i love these shoes. It definitely helps me with my Achilles issues. The build is good and easy. I love barefoot walking so this is just amazing. Feel like a Ninja. The price is on a higher side which will put off a lot of folks.
customer_reviews.author: Ghostman

customer_reviews.title: These are the most comfortable shoes I've every owned!!
customer_reviews.text: Brought these after they come highly recommended by a friend and wow was he right! These are brilliant, the most conformable shoes I've ever owned. They feel like walking bare feet but have just the right amount of sole to make walking over rough ground comfortable. Think I will be wearing these a lot more than I expected when I bought them. Only small downside is they feel a little to big. I brought in my normal size 9 and they feel like a size 9.5 but to be honest it doesn't affect anything comfort wise. Cannot recommend them enough!!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: They are really great, but the small edges (where straps clip on) ...
customer_reviews.text: They are really great, but the small edges (where straps clip on) start to brush against your foot and get really annoying after a while, but this problem occurs only when wearing them barefoot without socks. Other then that wouldn't want my shoes other way, plain, simple, comfy and feel like I'm barefoot while walking on street!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love these rook them to egypt and was perfect. I was bit sceptical about buying them due to the price but glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Séan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as I wanted something comfortable and lightweight to wear around the house and on short trips out. They have exceeded my expectations. They are really comfortable and allow your feet to move naturally. They do take a bit of getting used to as there is no real cushioning on the sole so it can feel weird.
customer_reviews.author: A Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit! Finally!
customer_reviews.text: The USA Vibram store has a rubbish size chart where the shoe was smaller than the size indicated. But this UK store has a perfect size chart! Excellent fit!
customer_reviews.author: Vihir Patel

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable wrap I suffer from plantar fasciitis, Tendonitis, bone spur
customer_reviews.author: Womble

customer_reviews.title: They are unusual but great to wear !
customer_reviews.text: Great for Pilates so easy to wear gets people talking
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt the best shoes I have ever had, love them, so comfy
customer_reviews.author: J. Cook

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are very comfortable, they are very soft and have great grip
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable, they are very soft and have great grip. They feel like you're walking barefoot with a thin layer of rubber under your foot
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: A very good shoe
customer_reviews.text: They are good fitting comfortable and good for your feet
customer_reviews.author: jug

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these very comfy I have very wide feet fit great
customer_reviews.author: deano 1979

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Make sure you read the fitting giluide on Vibrams website

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. It fits well, gives my feet a lot of freedom while protecting them
customer_reviews.author: mujtaba

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super shoes, comfy, cool & feather light, a fantastic alternative to sandals.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair and I absolutely love them. Comfy and light, I wear them as much as I can.
customer_reviews.author: "dare2fail"

customer_reviews.text: This is the most butters shoe I've ever seen. What are they #robinhood 5s

customer_reviews.title: Go a size up
customer_reviews.text: These feel great but I would deffinatly order at least half a size above your shoe size as the tapered toe box is very restrictive.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Ok for a week....
customer_reviews.text: Put these on my feet, a week later both my feet hatched into butterflies. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

product_meta.title: Vibram FiveFingers Men's Vibram Furoshiki Original Low-Top Sneakers
product_meta.description: Furoshiki in the Japanese culture refers to the tradition of wrapping, holding and carrying various objects with cloth. Vibram has created the first wrapping sole.Material Construction- 28% Elastane (Stretch Rubber / Lycra), 72% PA (polyamide & nylon).
feature_bullets: Vibram Furoshiki: the wrap sole for everywhere and everything you do!

Furoshiki is the only sole on the market that covers the entire foot. As the upper is made of stretch material, it adapts anatomically to any type of foot and the Velcro closure system allows for a quick, easy fit.
